summary: Aspiring software developer with expertise in Python, Java, full-stack development, and experience in AI-driven solutions and cybersecurity. Passionate about creating innovative solutions and contributing to impactful projects in software development, focusing on AI and cybersecurity.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

work_experience.title: Computer Programming Instructor
responsibilities: Designed and delivered a comprehensive curriculum on computer and network systems.
Taught programming languages (VB, Python, Java) to high school students, focusing on real-world applications.
Mentored 20-30 students per class, helping them develop independent coding projects and problem-solving skills.

work_experience.title: Intern
responsibilities: Worked on JavaScript and React projects, contributing to front-end development and enhancing web applications.
Participated in workshops, collaborating with peers to develop and deploy practical web solutions.
Implemented dynamic features for projects, improving user experience and functionality.

projects.name: Deceptify
projects.description: An AI-driven project focused on conducting social engineering attacks using generative AI content, like deepfakes, to enhance organizational preparedness against evolving digital threats.
responsibilities: Built the core RAG agent for conducting real-time attacks using Zoom and Telegram with voice clone models.
projects.results: Demonstrated innovative AI-driven social engineering attacks and served as a key example of AI integration in cybersecurity projects.

projects.name: Market Ordering Assistance
projects.description: A social media platform with AI assistance for seamless market orders from leading companies.
responsibilities: Developed the entire project from concept to implementation.
Built a complete system that assists users with market orders, leveraging AI to streamline and personalize the experience.

projects.name: JavaFX Book Scrabble Game
projects.description: An interactive, book-themed Scrabble game that can be played online between users.
responsibilities: Implemented online multiplayer mode, enabling real-time gameplay over the Internet.

accomplishments.name: Oracle & Colman Hackathon
accomplishments.description: Specialized in applying data science and big data learning software on the cloud to address agricultural challenges.
accomplishments.result: Achieved third place in a hackathon competition.

accomplishments.name: ANAC 2024 Competition
accomplishments.description: Participated in the Automated Negotiating Agent Competition (ANAC), an international AI competition focusing on negotiation strategies in multi-agent systems.
accomplishments.result: Gained hands-on experience in AI, machine learning, and decision-making algorithms.

devops_final_project.description: Containerized application with Docker Compose, creating four images, including a secure reverse proxy on port 80.
details: Configured infrastructure using Ansible playbooks for AWS EC2 instances.
Successfully deployed the application on AWS EC2, ensuring secure and efficient production-ready performance.
